title: Yellow Flame Butane Lighter Insert #65800 By Zippo
description: Zippo's yellow flame butane insert is the perfect accessory for any classic Zippo lighter case. The refillable butane insert stays true to Zippo's roots in form and function and produces an odorless yellow flame for even more versatility.FEATURESGenuine Zippo Yellow Flame Insert; Reliable flint wheel ignitionUp to 1,400°F/760°C pressurized single flameRefillable with butane fuel; 0.9g fuel capacityFits all Classic Zippo lighter cases - does not fit Slim or 1935 Replica casesRefillable with butane fuel; 0.9g fuel capacityInsert retains the famous Zippo "click" soundFuel: Zippo premium butane fluid (sold separately)
